pkgmetadata.longdescription: B Cell Receptor Somatik Hyper Mutation Analysis // B Cell Receptor Somatik Hyper Mutation Analysis provide analysis of nucleotide frequency, transition, transversion, reconstruction of germline sequences based on IMGT outputs, calculate and plot the percentage difference at 6 positions to a nucleotide mutation to identify the hotspot motifs and calculate and plot average mutation frequency of nucleotide mutations resulting in amino acid substitution.
